command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3YXoXGPLXt3wWhf.root --database nqydgfj3CzwtjtyHoTRdFv --execute 
-- Verificar e atualizar treeloko
UPDATE users SET emailVerified = 1 WHERE username = 'treeloko';

-- Criar usuários de teste se não existirem
INSERT IGNORE INTO users (openId, username, email, passwordHash, passwordSalt, emailVerified, role, loginMethod, createdAt, updatedAt, lastSignedIn)
VALUES 
  ('user-streamer-test', 'streamer_test', 'streamer@test.com', SHA2(CONCAT('senha123', 'salt123'), 256), 'salt123', 1, 'streamer', 'email', NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),
  ('user-viewer-test', 'viewer_test', 'viewer@test.com', SHA2(CONCAT('senha123', 'salt456'), 256), 'salt456', 1, 'viewer', 'email', NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),
  ('user-admin-test', 'admin_test', 'admin@test.com', SHA2(CONCAT('senha123', 'salt789'), 256), 'salt789', 1, 'admin', 'email', NOW(), NOW(), NOW());

-- Retornar usuários criados/verificados
SELECT id, username, email, role, emailVerified FROM users WHERE username IN ('treeloko', 'streamer_test', 'viewer_test', 'admin_test');
stdout:
id	username	email	role	emailVerified

840003	viewer_test	viewer@test.com	viewer	1
